events.message: I received the wrong item my order was supposed to be a blue jacket but instead I got a red shirt. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request concerns a refund due to receiving an incorrect product, matching refund cluster criteria.
Support case assigned to refund specialist team to handle the customer's return and refund request promptly.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I'll help you with the return and refund process right away.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received? This will help us process the refund quickly.
Thank you for responding. The order number is 12345678, and I have attached a photo showing the red shirt instead of the blue jacket.
We have received your details and photo. I have initiated the refund process. You will get your money back within 5-7 business days and a prepaid label to return the incorrect item.
Thanks for the quick help! I appreciate the refund initiation and look forward to receiving the label for returning the shirt.
The refund has been processed and the return shipping label sent to your email. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Hi again! Just checking in to confirm you received the return label and the refund has arrived in your account. We're here if you have any more questions.
Since the refund was completed and the return process went smoothly, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your support experience. Your feedback helps us improve our service. Thank you!
